name: Final Clue Oakloon
storyline: Due to a personal vendetta against a suspected serial killer retired homicide detective John Valerez returns to a old crime scene in a abandoned house deep within the Oakloon forest. Go on a urban exploration of the area, investigate and locate clues and learn the truth about this old unsolved case.
summary: Final Clue Oakloon is a Gritty Dark VHS Urbex Homicide Detective Survival Horror with combat and emphasis on atmosphere, as well as unpredictability, realism and providing a realistic solo urban exploration in a abandoned overgrown house in the woods & the feeling of being stalked during your investigation for the truth about an old crime case, you will have to fight your way through whoever resides here in order to come to the truth and conclusion of this old case.
